## frustum variable

Constructs a 4x4 matrix representing the given view frustum. Creates new matrix if `out` is `null`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
frustum: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, left: number, right: number, bottom: number, top: number, near: number, far: number) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
